# actions

**Instance Property**

An array of the workflow’s actions.

## Declaration

```swift
var actions: [AMAction] { get }
```

## Return Value

An array of actions for the workflow file. Actions are instances of classes such as [doc://com.apple.automator/documentation/Automator/AMBundleAction], [doc://com.apple.automator/documentation/Automator/AMAppleScriptAction], and [doc://com.apple.automator/documentation/Automator/AMShellScriptAction].

## Getting Information About a Workflow

- **fileURL**: A URL that specifies the location of the workflow file.
- **valueForVariable(withName:)**: Returns the value of the workflow variable with the specified name.

items.description: A URL that specifies the location of the workflow file.
items.name: fileURL

items.description: Returns the value of the workflow variable with the specified name.
items.name: valueForVariable(withName:)
